column4: Good morning wizards. ANybody know where the default shares MYHOUSE are configured from

Trying to share some samba folders to my new OPPO player. I can see the default Ubuntu shares for MYHOUSE but not my samba ones. NO idea where the MYHOUSE comes from or how it is configured. It basically just shows my music, docs etc.
last time I did that i was editing config file for samba and restarting samba itself before it shows up.
